subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to test private methods, its urgent
msgSnippet: javalist wrote: With respect, this is the worst advice you could possibly have given. Do not /COPY/ code in order to test it. Ever. Ever. Ever. ...
messageBody:
javalist wrote:

With respect, this is the worst advice you could possibly have given.

Do not /COPY/ code in order to test it. Ever. Ever.

Ever.

> hi:

<snip />

Ever.
